name: lws

scripts.cover: TESTOPEN=true nyc -r html -r text npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.docs: jsdoc2md lib/middleware-plugin.js > doc/middleware-plugin.md && jsdoc2md --private index.js > doc/lws.md && jsdoc2md lib/view/view-plugin.js > doc/view-plugin.md && jsdoc2md lib/config.js > doc/config.md
